title: Pregnant Rachel Riley cradles her growing baby bump as she leaves filming
text:
She's just weeks away from welcoming her first child with husband Pasha Kovalev.

And Rachel Riley proudly displayed her blossoming baby bump in a tight purple top on Tuesday, as she exited another day of Countdown filming in Manchester.

The presenter, 33, cut a casual figure in the top which she teamed with a matching cardigan tied in a bow just over her bump as she left Media City.

Relaxed: Rachel Riley, 33, proudly displayed her blossoming baby bump in a tight purple blouse on Tuesday, as she exited another day of Countdown filming in Manchester

Wrapping up against the chilly weather, Rachel cut a casual figure in her stylish aubergine top, along with the cosy cardigan which was tied in at the waist.

The mother-to-be teamed the top with indigo jeans and white trainers, and finished her low-key look with a black faux fur coat.

Rachel once again had a red poppy pinned to her stylish coat in support of those affected by war - they are usually worn after October 31 in the eleven-day run up to Armistice Day on November 11.

Lovely: The presenter looked glowing in the pretty top which she teamed with a matching black cardigan, which was tied into a bow to accentuate her bump

Rachel is just a few weeks away from welcoming her first child with her Strictly professional husband Pasha, 39, in December.

The couple announced they were set to become parents for the first time in May.

Revealing the pregnancy news via the Countdown star's Instagram account, Rachel posed in front of a board of letters spelling out the words 'r tiny mate', an anagram of the word 'maternity', while placing her hands on her baby bump.

She captioned the sweet snap: 'Pash and I have a conundrum for you... you have till December to work it out! We're over the moon excited.'

Cosy: Rachel covered up the casual top with a black faux fur coat as she battled the chilly climes on her way out of filming

Low-key: The mother-to-be teamed her off-duty look with indigo blue skinny jeans and white trainers

They got married in Las Vegas in June, keeping the ceremony 'so secret' that the majority of their friends and family were said to have been completely unaware of the nuptials.

Rachel confirmed the news on social media, sharing a picture from their big day, captioned: 'Introducing the new Mr and Mrs Kovalev... We both said yes!'

During a recent appearance on Celebrity Gogglebox, Rachel hinted she could be having a baby girl because she 'couldn't see a penis' in her latest scan.

The mathematician first met Pasha when they were partnered on Strictly Come Dancing in 2013, going official with their romance the following year.
description: The presenter, 33, cut a casual figure in the top which she teamed with a matching cardigan tied in a bow just over her bump  as she left Media City in Manchester on Tuesday after a day of filming.
